data.message: Facebook, you keep forcing changes on what I see without my input I'll eventually just stop caring to even check the site. First you auto filter the comments without allowing me to modify how it filters (it changes back automatically.) Now you are auto sorting my notifications to "what we feel you want to see" when in actually its the exact opposite. How about you let me choose what I want to see instead of force feeding me your bs.

replies.message: Hey Paul. We’re sorry to hear you feel that way. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2A2VVSZ. -Tenaya

Facebook I'd like to turn this filter off, but I can't find where to do that (I'm an adult, I don't need supervision), how do I do that?

Thanks for the solution in advance :)
I hate the notification change as well.

Facebook why did you reply here but you do not reply to me abt my son's disabled acct because someone reported him as a non person. I can vouch for him being a person as I gave birth to him more than 4 decades ago. He tried to send you the docs you requested to prove he is real but the messge went w/o the docs & now won't allow him to send docs & says they are cking docs sent.He was unable to send docs. Pls reply!
